description: With this skill, Alexa learns a whole bunch of fun facts about sloths. Simply ask Alexa for a sloth fact, and you'll get a random bit of info about everyone's favorite slow-moving mammal.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Sloth Facts for a fact
Alexa, tell me something from Sloth Facts
Alexa, give me a fact from Sloth Facts
name: Sloth Facts
shortDescription: Learn about sloths with these fun facts!
